Summary: it came closer then farther then gone

divs: Sighting Detailsit was a childrens birthday i stayed up late with my cousin i layed down at almost 5am then 5 minutes later she taps me,tells me come outside so then i go and she tells me to look up towards houston from our position and approximately 30-50 miles away its a pretty large light all by itself glowing i called my wife she saww it for like 3 min then went back inside my cousin then records video on her camera and thats a good picture of a large then get alittle smaller lose light for 5 seconds then reapear in the same spot it also would slowly move towads the east and at the same speed come right back i saw some times i would'nt see a bright light now it was like a cross alittle crooked and like if it was spinning then the sun was barely coming turning the skies light puple to dark blue it dissapears and 3-5 min later the skies are visibe
